Package scenegraph

Class MaterialState

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenegraph.AbstSceneObject
      • scenegraph.AbstNode
        • scenegraph.AbstRenderState
          • scenegraph.MaterialState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, ChannelInterface
    public class MaterialState
extends AbstRenderState
    Class to store and provide access to the render engine's material attributes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ursula Derichs

    • Constructor Detail

      • MaterialState

        public MaterialState()
        Constructs the material state. The attributes are initialized as follows: - emissive: Color::BLACK - ambient: 20% grey - diffuse: 80% grey - specular: Color::BLACK - shininess: 0
